strapiPost.title: Make Plans For The Fourth At The Walmart AMP
strapiPost.content:
Tickets are on sale now for the Fireworks Spectacular – An American Salute at the Walmart AMP on Tuesday, Jul 4, including fireworks and a live performance by the Symphony of Northwest Arkansas.

  • The sights: The City of Rogers will sponsor the celebration, bringing the community together for a night of entertainment and a spectacular fireworks show at NWA’s premier outdoor amphitheater.
  • The sounds: The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas has served the community with musical performances and education opportunities since 1954. Under the musical direction of Paul Haas, SoNA’s concert will celebrate the beauty and grandeur of America and honor our nation’s veterans and those who bravely serve in our nation’s armed forces.

Advance tickets range from $3-25. Reserve yours HERE.
